catalyst: TiO2 (specifically, commercial TiO2-P25 and synthesized TiO2 nanoparticles) is used as the catalyst in the experiment. The synthesis also involves using titanium tetraisopropoxide (TTIP) as a precursor.
co_catalyst: TiO2-P25 is used as a benchmark catalyst in the experiment. The text details the preparation and doping of other catalysts, but TiO2-P25 serves as the primary reference point for comparison.
